Class Term

java.lang.Object
Term
public class Term extends Object
The Term class provides all fields and methods necessary for the representation of terms for the convenience of the QuineMcCluskey class to solve.
Since:
2023-11-21
Version:
1.0
Author:
Marxel S. Abogado, Carla Joy G. Haboc

  • Constructor Details

    • Term

      public Term(int value, int length)
      constructor for the initialization of new term from integer minterm value
      Parameters:
      value - the integer value of minterm
      length - the length of the binary string to pad leading zeroes to match the maximum minterm

    • Term

      public Term(Term term1, Term term2)
      constructor for term when it two minterms are grouped
      Parameters:
      term1 - the first term grouped
      term2 - the second term grouped

  • Method Details

    • getString

      String getString()
      gets a term's binary value in String form.
      Returns:
      String of term's current binary value

    • getNums

      ArrayList<Integer> getNums()
      gets the list of integer minterms grouped to create the term.
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing current grouped minterms of term

    • getNumOnes

      int getNumOnes()
      gets the number of ones present in the term's binary form.
      Returns:
      integer value of counted ones in term
